abstract: The collective agreement in St. Hyacinthe, Quebec, is the only one covering Wal-Mart employees in North America.
snippet: The collective agreement in St. Hyacinthe, Quebec, is the only one covering Wal-Mart employees in North America.
lead_paragraph: After years of legal challenges, a Quebec government arbitrator has awarded workers at a Wal-Mart store a labor agreement.

headline.main: Labor Pact at a Quebec Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Labor Pact at a Quebec Wal-Mart

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
